title: Allergens to Watch Out For
description: At dinner, it's vital to acknowledge allergens like nuts, dairy, and gluten to accommodate dietary restrictions. Prioritizing allergen awareness ensures a safe and inclusive dining experience for all guests. Always inquire about allergies to make the meal enjoyable and worry-free.
